survey_name: AI-Powered Customer Support Chatbot Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with AI-powered chatbots used in customer support services, including effectiveness, ease of use, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Ensure answer options cover all frequency ranges to capture accurate usage patterns.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support chatbots?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your overall satisfaction with AI-powered customer support chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent sentiment measurement.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your overall satisfaction with AI-powered customer support chatbots?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with AI-powered chatbots? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is answered (any option).
questions.client_notes: Multi-select options to allow respondents to highlight key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an 'Other' open-text field.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with AI-powered chatbots? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is answered (any option).

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific positive or negative experiences you've had with AI-powered customer support chatbots.
